Category

Id Name
{{ category.itemCode }} {{ category.saleCount }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'category-data', templateUrl: './category.component.html' }) export class CategoryComponent { public categories: ItemDetails[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Category').subscribe(result => { this.categories = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface ItemDetails { itemCode: string; saleCount: number; }
